author: stux
title: I bought this for my 6 month old :)
review:
This was the first set I bought my 6 month old after a basic bucket o bricks.

She loved the little chicken... and "granny"

This led to us buying the nursery as she loves all the animals

She loves doors, and this set comes with a nice barn door and wedges, which make building time more interesting for the adults ;)
